attributes.action: National enquiry into child grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: It should never have happened in the first place, these gangs need to be smashed and all involved to be held accountable l.
attributes.background: Be held accountable due to them pulling cotton wool over there eyes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
